Description: Body sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style, pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; top of rim glazed; exterior: band of dotted blanks at rim, reserved below; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number 50 is written in pencil on the interior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0997) (phase 2)
